description: This PHP source file manages the Web UI for wireless network configuration on a gateway device. It includes PHP code for fetching current Wi-Fi settings via TR-069 or similar protocols, and extensive embedded JavaScript for dynamic UI interactions, validation, and AJAX communication with backend scripts. The file appears to generate an administrative web page that allows users to view and modify Wi-Fi parameters, including radio enable/disable, SSID configurations, security settings, channel and bandwidth options, Wi-Fi security, WPS, and band steering features.
